lusilab 0.0.1
  • Reference

lusilab: Language Use and Social Interaction Lab

Source: R/lusilab-package.R
lusilab-package.Rd

Includes functions for power analysis, permuting or bootstrapping mediations, automated factor analysis, and pulling text from reddit, imsdb, and rottentomatoes, plus some other things to play with.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://miserman.github.io/lusilab/

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/miserman/lusilab/issues
